Class miniGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • miniGame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    diceRolls, guessTheNumber, rockPaperScissors

    public class miniGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Date: May 14th 2018 This class is the parent class for all MiniGames. miniGame class provides each minigame a String variable Name and Rules as attributes.
    Author:
    Sachin Sakthivel and Sasiru Goonatillake

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String gameDescription​()
      Parent method for minigames which allows a description of a minigame to be obtained for a specific minigame.
      java.lang.String getGameName​()
      This method returns the Name of the minigame.
      java.lang.String getGameRules​()
      This method returns the Rules of the minigame.
      boolean play​(Hero hero)
      Parent method for minigames which allows the User to use a Hero to fight the villain using the specified minigame.
      void setGameName​(java.lang.String gameName)
      This method updates the Name of the miniGame using the String variable gameName.
      void setGameRules​(java.lang.String gameRules)
      This method updates the Rules of the miniGame using the String variable gameRules.

    • Constructor Detail

      • miniGame

        public miniGame​(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String rules)
        Constructor method for class miniGame. Name and Rules are given using input String variables name and rules.
        Parameters:
        name - String variable of minigame Name.
        rules - String variable of minigame Rules.

      • setGameName

        public void setGameName​(java.lang.String gameName)

        Parameters:
        gameName - Input String variable of minigame Name.

      • getGameRules

        public java.lang.String getGameRules​()
        This method returns the Rules of the minigame.
        Returns:
        Returns String variable gameRules.

      • setGameRules

        public void setGameRules​(java.lang.String gameRules)
        This method updates the Rules of the miniGame using the String variable gameRules.
        Parameters:
        gameRules - Input String variable of minigame Rules.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        Overrides:

      • play

        public boolean play​(Hero hero)
        Parent method for minigames which allows the User to use a Hero to fight the villain using the specified minigame.
        Parameters:
        hero - Input Hero object, hero which plays the minigame.
        Returns:
        Returns false by default.

      • gameDescription

        public java.lang.String gameDescription​()
        Parent method for minigames which allows a description of a minigame to be obtained for a specific minigame. The description will be specified in each minigame.
        Returns:
        Returns String "Not Implemented Yet" by default.
